text: saum puok anak yk dek muoy banteah aoy khnhom . ( keat ban dak dek noh) rhaut teal te vea penh nei chanlohphnom teangpir . keat ban niyeay tha chaur puok anak phlom( pheu l ng dot dek)choh rhaut tealte dek teangnoh ( krahm) klaytowchea phleung keat ban niyeay tha chaur anak teangoasa knea yk tngdeng rleay mk aoy khnhom khnhom nung chak pi leu vea
